gamesList.name: DOTA 2
gamesList.description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover.

gamesList.name: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
gamesList.description: PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS is a battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.

gamesList.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
gamesList.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago.

gamesList.name: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
gamesList.description: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first in the award-winning series to recreate epic conflict across ancient China.

gamesList.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
gamesList.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is the latest installment of the acclaimed first-person shooter franchise developed by the renowned Ubisoft Montreal studio.

gamesList.name: Grand Theft Auto V
gamesList.description: Los Santos is a city of bright lights, long nights and dirty secrets, and they donâ€™t come brighter, longer or dirtier than in GTA Online: After Hours. The party starts now.
